text: At Night All Blood Is Black () is a novel by French author David Diop. It was first published in French on August 16, 2018, by Éditions du Seuil. It won the Prix Goncourt des Lycéens that same year. The English translation by Anna Moschovakis won the 2021 International Booker Prize. It was published in the UK by Pushkin Press and in the US by Farrar, Straus and Giroux. ==References== Category:2018 books Category:French novels
title: At Night All Blood Is Black
